interestingcomments.content: Canon 5D MKIV - Problem with light blue fabrics /!/ I'm wondering if anyone else has had this issue and found a good solution for it. I've had a problem with light blue fabrics when viewing them at different sizes where there is lots of banding. It appears in Photoshop and Lightroom small preview windows, but it's terrible in Finder, Dropbox, or other file management software. When zooming in, the fabric looks normal, but it appears that different programs can't differentiate the detail in the light blue fabric. I've tried a few moire removing techniques that sometimes work, but mainly blur the detail.
